data.title: 19Th Century Tales And Short Stories: Claude Gueux
data.meta_description: Claude Gueux, a jobless labor worker, led a miserable life with his wife and daughter. Wanting to give them a nice Christmas, he stole a wallet. This â¦
data.text:
Claude Gueux, a jobless labor worker, led a miserable life with his wife and daughter. Wanting to give them a nice Christmas, he stole a wallet. This fatal act earned him five years in prison. In detention, Claude gained respect from those around him. The befriended Antonie, to whom he became a protector. After the head guard separated them, he sinks into despair.

History 2009 55 min Prime Video
